ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions that read and solve linear inverse problems (food web problems, linear programming problems). These problems find solutions to linear or quadratic functions: min or max (f(x)), where f(x) = ||Ax-b||^2 or f(x) = sum(ai*xi) subject to equality constraints Ex=f and inequality constraints Gx>=h. Uses package limSolve.

Functions that read and solve linear inverse problems (food web problems, linear programming problems). These problems find solutions to linear or quadratic functions: min or max (f(x)), where f(x) = ||Ax-b||^2 or f(x) = sum(ai*xi) subject to equality constraints Ex=f and inequality constraints Gx>=h. Uses package limSolve.

name: r-lim
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.4.7.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-lim
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/LIM_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/LIM/LIM_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 461df14b090b1f4f74f91e1f8120057bf47bc586cb41fa3653f66a96c014337a

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-diagram
    - r-limsolve
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-diagram
    - r-limsolve

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('LIM')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('LIM')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=LIM
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: 'Functions that read and solve linear inverse problems (food web problems, linear programming problems). These problems find solutions to linear or quadratic functions: min or max (f(x)), where f(x) = ||Ax-b||^2 or f(x) = sum(ai*xi) subject to equality constraints Ex=f and inequality constraints Gx>=h. Uses package
    limSolve.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: LIM
# Version: 1.4.6
# Title: Linear Inverse Model examples and solution methods.
# Author: Karline Soetaert <karline.soetaert@nioz.nl>, Dick van Oevelen<dick.vanoevelen@nioz.nl>
# Maintainer: Karline Soetaert <karline.soetaert@nioz.nl>
# Depends: R (>= 2.10), limSolve, diagram
# Description: Functions that read and solve linear inverse problems (food web problems, linear programming problems). These problems find solutions to linear or quadratic functions: min or max (f(x)), where f(x) = ||Ax-b||^2 or f(x) = sum(ai*xi) subject to equality constraints Ex=f and inequality constraints Gx>=h. Uses package limSolve.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyData: yes
# Packaged: 2014-12-24 13:45:37 UTC; rforge
# Repository: CRAN
# Repository/R-Forge/Project: lim

# NeedsCompilation: no
